problem_text: \triangle K L N and \triangle L M N are isosceles and m \angle J K N = 130. Find the measure of \angle L N M.
compact_text: \triangle KLN and \triangle LMN are isosceles and m \angle JKN = 130. Find the measure of \angle LNM.
annotat_text: $\triangle K L N$ and $\triangle L M N$ are isosceles and $m \angle J K N=130$. Find the measure of $\angle LNM$.
